definition: to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things

sentences.english: Prepay and Post Pay option for each dial plan.
sentences.chinese: 预付款和后付款选项为每个拨号计划。

sentences.english: Dynamics of ecosystem science. Requires paid subscription.
sentences.chinese: 描述生态系统的刊物，需要预付定金。
考虑预付费的银行借记卡。

sentences.english: And second, prepaid, contractless customers are more likely to change providers.
sentences.chinese: 第二，预付用户更有可能更换供应商。

sentences.english: We require an advance of 15% be remitted to us one month ahead of the shipment.
sentences.chinese: 我们要求15%的预付款于装运前一个月汇付至我方。

sentences.english: If you feel you are paying too much for cell phone service , switch to a prepaid card.
sentences.chinese: 如果您觉得您付出太多的手机服务，切换到预付卡。

sentences.english: You can buy a prepaid card to control the expense.
sentences.chinese: 你可以买预付卡来控制花费啊。

sentences.english: These previously-withheld taxes are returned back to me this year.
sentences.chinese: 这些预付税本年还回来了。

sentences.english: We insist on payment in advance, we can’t accept payment after arrival goods.
sentences.chinese: 我们坚持预付货款，不能接受货到付款。

sentences.english: Users can buy refill card at retail and add credit to the pre-paid account.
sentences.chinese: 用户可以购买充值卡，给预付费账号充值。

sentences.english: Then you recover back that upfront capex over say 15 years as mentioned in the article.
sentences.chinese: 然后如文章所提到的你在15年内分期收回预付资本。

sentences.english: Customers without membership card please pay a deposite of 200 Rmb per lane .
sentences.chinese: 散客消费请预付每条球道200元押金。

sentences.english: Therefor the system of the full electronic watt-hour meter of prepayment has widely application prospect.
sentences.chinese: 因此，预付费电子电能表系统具有广泛的应用前景。

sentences.english: Pre-payment with cashier's check or money order is accepted.
sentences.chinese: 预付款用本票或汇票都可以。

definition: to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
to pay sb else's expense with the expectation of being reimbursed by that person later
to defer payment/to pay back over long term
to pay in advance/to get payment in advance
